section.p: This manual describes how to get started with FUJITSU Software Enterprise Service Catalog Manager, hereafter referred to as .

section.title: Readers of this Manual
section.p: This manual is directed to operators who want to quickly set up a basic installation of with Docker and Docker Compose. For more detailed information on configuration and usage, refer to the official documentation For more detailed information on configuration and usage, refer to the official documentation. It assumes that you are familiar with the following:

ul.li: Administration of the operating systems in use, including the adaption and execution of batch files or shell scripts.
Java EE technology, particularly as to the deployment on application servers.
Container technology, particularly Docker and Docker Compose.
concepts as explained in the Overview manual.
